function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of hygiene measures in urban environments","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, such as tuberculosis","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper hygiene measures, sanitation, and waste removal","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, waste management technologies","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"Government authorities, city planners, urban developers"},{"Description":"Population density and health correlation","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and disease in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Regulation of population density, implementation of ventilation and sunlight measures","Technologies":"Urban planning, building design for ventilation and sunlight","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"City planners, architects, developers"},{"Description":"Tuberculosis mortality and housing density correlation","Impact":"Higher tuberculosis mortality in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Regulation of housing density, implementation of ventilation and sunlight measures","Technologies":"Urban planning, building design for ventilation and sunlight","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"City planners, architects, developers"}]}
